Trial.Trial_TitleMenu_Nintendoeshop_Info:
[UE:Meta key="28ce987126c74f269a68899934ef5498" Scale="1"/]You can visit Nintendo eShop to purchase
the full version of this game.
Trial.Trial_TitleMenu_SendReport_Info:
[UE:Meta key="393468cecfdf4bc2b907a6f1fff116ca" Scale="1"/]You can send confirmation that you've completed this demo to
receive a special gift in the smart-device app Pikmin Bloom.
Trial.Trial_IntroPrivilege00:
[UE:Meta key="28e51929ab49444fb97117a14edb84b6" Scale="1"/]If you complete this demo, you can receive special
rewards in the smart-device app Pikmin Bloom.
Scan the QR Code below for further details.
Trial.Trial_IntroPrivilege01:
[UE:Meta key="56d3d1b7ecff4cdd99a2545b6292646d" Scale="1"/]The demo version is complete once you [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]collect
1,500 units of sparklium and finish exploring for
the day[System:Color name="Default"]. You can import your save data from
the demo into the full version of the game.
Trial.Trial_InfoClear:
[UE:Meta key="48f4cf309e5a4bedb6ce7eac06bd9730" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Collect 1,500 units of sparklium and finish the
day [System:Color name="Default"]to complete the demo. Afterward, you can
receive rewards both in the smart-device app
Pikmin Bloom and in the full version of the game.
Trial.Trial_Privilege:
[UE:Meta key="6637c0d9f1cc4afeb62cbfaea6f41369" Scale="1"/]You completed this demo! You can import
completed save data into the full version
of the game to receive a bonus gift there.
Trial.Trial_Thanks:
[UE:Meta key="4311ede722c64bb0aec12f68513b7df6" Scale="1"/]You reached the end of this demo. You can enjoy
the rest of the adventure in the full version!
Trial.Trial_ReportDescription:
[UE:Meta key="d71c9b26e8b340a4b1dc322c4c1f9180" Scale="1"/]If you send confirmation that you've completed this demo,
you can receive special rewards in the smart-device app
Pikmin Bloom. Scan QR Code for further details.
Trial.Trial_ReportWait: [UE:Meta key="f41a69ea43de4098b524c8ee7fe3ca9e" Scale="1"/]Sending confirmation of demo completion...
Trial.Trial_ReportSuccess:
[UE:Meta key="0338217803444ba08380ed9f70338f20" Scale="1"/]Confirmation that you've completed this
demo has been sent. Scan QR Code below
for more info on how to get the offer
code to claim your rewards.
Trial.Trial_ReportHowToResend:
[UE:Meta key="4875d17dc68e453da5160ed4504581cc" Scale="1"/]You can select Send Confirmation from
the title screen to confirm that you've
completed this demo.
Trial.Trial_Locked:
[UE:Meta key="8f5ff563d3ee44ad8819d007d9abe2d0" Scale="1"/]This mode is only accessible in
the full version of the game.
Trial.Trial_ReportDescription_info: [UE:Meta key="1db3c1e7656d4f9bb01c099da67a4fff" Scale="1"/]Send confirmation that you completed this demo now?
Trial.Trial_Thanks_Caption04: [UE:Meta key="16c2f2296d10474c8c0b1341f9f4efbd" Scale="1"/]Find yourself in...a toy box?
Trial.Trial_Thanks_Caption06: [UE:Meta key="5957bd0a025241d6b3d1424518f87bb0" Scale="1"/]Complete your tasks by sunset!
Trial.Trial_Thanks_Caption08: [UE:Meta key="862edf69bf8e4f6ca9c842960eed102f" Scale="1"/]Go on dangerous night expeditions.
Trial.Trial_Thanks_Caption09: [UE:Meta key="2f405f7958d949d2bbf6af2b2415cf65" Scale="1"/]Can you save all the Rescue Officers?
Trial.Trial_Thanks_Caption11: [UE:Meta key="cd1b2eddf0ca4b54be2ea54601728cbb" Scale="1"/]Partner up with space dog [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Trial.Trial_Thanks_Caption13: [UE:Meta key="1c3f4bfc56804cb6a7f64d2942d2f53b" Scale="1"/]Score big in Dandori Challenges!
Trial.Trial_Thanks_Caption14: [UE:Meta key="77606324d6df485a9c48a451507c64d7" Scale="1"/]Work together in Co-op Mode!
Trial.Trial_Thanks_Annotation:
[UE:Meta key="d54dece014a942cc82e3dbd9e809c113" Scale="1"/]You can import your completed save data into the full version
of the game to receive a special reward there.
